verses.text: For Zion’s sake will I not hold my peace, and for Jerusalem’s sake I will not rest, until the righteousness thereof go forth as brightness, and the salvation thereof as a lamp thatburneth.
And the Gentiles shall see thy righteousness, and all kings thy glory: and thou shalt be called by a new name, which the mouth of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*shall name.
Thou shalt also be a crown of glory in the hand of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, and a royal diadem in the hand of thy God.

Thou shalt no more be termed Forsaken; neither shall thy land any more be termed Desolate: but thou shalt be called Hephzi-bah, and thy land Beulah: for the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*delighteth in thee, and thy land shall be married.
¶ For asa young man marrieth a virgin, soshall thy sons marry thee: and asthe bridegroom rejoiceth over the bride, soshall thy God rejoice over thee.
I have set watchmen upon thy walls, O Jerusalem, whichshall never hold their peace day nor night: ye that make mention of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, keep not silence,
And give him no rest, till he establish, and till he make Jerusalem a praise in the earth.

The \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*hath sworn by his right hand, and by the arm of his strength, Surely I will no more give thy corn to bemeat for thine enemies; and the sons of the stranger shall not drink thy wine, for the which thou hast laboured:
But they that have gathered it shall eat it, and praise the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*; and they that have brought it together shall drink it in the courts of my holiness.
¶ Go through, go through the gates; prepare ye the way of the people; cast up, cast up the highway; gather out the stones; lift up a standard for the people.
Behold, the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*hath proclaimed unto the end of the world, Say ye to the daughter of Zion, Behold, thy salvation cometh; behold, his reward iswith him, and his work before him.
And they shall call them, The holy people, The redeemed of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*: and thou shalt be called, Sought out, A city not forsaken.
